components.description: A sign used to indicate roadwork or construction. Generally shown as yellow and black diagonal stripes, and often used to physically block access to a road or area. May be used to imply a website or project in progress or under construction.
components.title: Construction Sign

description: A sign used to indicate roadwork or construction. Generally shown as yellow and black diagonal stripes, and often used to physically block access to a road or area. May be used to imply a website or project in progress or under construction.
title: Construction Sign

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Transport And Map Symbols -> Traffic signs

bn:00082376v: To warn; to alert, advise that caution is warranted.
To warn strongly; put on guard.

bn:00086877v: To tell not to do something.
To forbid, disallow, or proscribe; to make illegal or illicit.

bn:00092103v: Shield from danger, injury, destruction, or damage
To prevent against danger, injury, destruction, or damage.

bn:00008713n: A structure or object that impedes free movement

bn:00767166n: Work in process, work in progress, goods in process, or in-process inventory are a company's partially finished goods waiting for completion and eventual sale or the value of these items.
Material that is in some stage of the manufacturing process, from raw material issued to a production order to a manufactured product ready for acceptance into inventory.
In production management, lean manufacturing and accounting
A portion of inventory that represents goods which are no longer salable as raw materials, but not yet salable as finished goods, work in process.
An item under current assets in the balance sheet that represents work in progress in some stage of the manufacturing process.

bn:00016027n: The trait of being cautious; being attentive to possible danger
Cautiousness is a faculty from Phrenology.

bn:00080495n: A message that notifies you of a build issue.

bn:00042062n: Rail placed alongside a dangerous place.
A rail placed alongside a dangerous place in order to improve safety.
A railing placed alongside a stairway or road for safety
Broad category of barriers that keep people or vehicles from straying into dangerous areas
A structure blocking an area from access
Guard rail or guardrail, sometimes referred to as guide rail or railing, is a system designed to keep people or vehicles from straying into dangerous or off-limits areas.
